name: Fallout Cap Collector
description:
click the Nuka Cola bottle to take the cap off, and upgrade it to get more caps. the settlers will help take the caps off. the more settlers, the faster you gain caps from them. 

anything you want me to add? leave a comment! I read them all, and I will do most requests!

This game is mostly mobile-friendly, but it will do some weird stuff with the number counter.

Play on turbo warp: https://turbowarp.org/580947210 

Play on scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/580947210/

11/14/2021 Update 1.2: added Vim! it comes right after dark, and before quantum. I also changed how settlers work, so they are less op and they are easier to find out what they are doing.

10/10/2022 Update  1.2.1: Just fixing the thousand cap marker not going down if you have less than a thousand, and re-balanced the settlers.

10/11/2022 Update 1.3.1: added mute button, re-did how settlers worked entirely, added two new nukes, recolored HUD, and got rid of some useless code and sprites to improve performance.
